questions.question: Why is the UV absorbance method suitable for protein quantitation?

answers.a: It detects all types of biomolecules.
answers.b: It specifically measures the presence of aromatic amino acids.
answers.c: It provides a visual color change.
answers.d: It is not influenced by nucleic acids.

questions.question: What is the primary reason for using Coomassie Brilliant Blue G-250 in the Bradford assay?

answers.b: It changes color upon binding to proteins.
answers.d: It has a high affinity for lipids.
